rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

The Government isn't directly responsible for the prices of most goods or services, which are set by businesses.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Reintroduce the Energy Bills Support Scheme for winter 2023/24: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637663

Take VAT off all food: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638836
